CustomField.description: If Finance Type is Marketing Expense, then populate with code: 800-99999-200127-9999-9999-USA0001-999-9999-9999 If Finance Type is Contra Revenue, then Ops need to insert appropriate code. (Through Work Flow this functionality would be achieved) .
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Finance Type is Marketing Expense, then field will be auto populate with code: "800-99999-200127-9999-9999-USA0001-999-9999-9999" once the record is saved. If Finance Type is Contra Revenue, then Ops need to insert appropriate code.
CustomField.label: FML Code
